needs: Ada seeks to deliver measurable machine learning outcomes by clarifying and aligning on outcomes, constraints, and observable signals early in projects. They aim to maintain velocity and simplicity in solutions while embedding security and privacy by design. Ada focuses on reducing firefighting through runbooks, SLOs, and dashboards and values collaborative, transparent progress across functions.
personality: Ada communicates directly and transparently, relying on data-driven decision-making and clear accountability. They value readable code and humane processes, fostering collaboration with concise documentation and mentorship. Ada prefers incremental, observable progress and embraces early risk surfacing via probes. Their style balances pragmatic craft with learning, maintaining discipline in process and simplicity for strategic advantage.
